comment: Activist Greta Thunberg named TIME magazine person of the year . Anyone know what she did besides skip school and throw a tantrum ?

(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (n / name-01
            :ARG1 (p / person
                  :name (n2 / name
                        :op1 "Greta"
                        :op2 "Thunberg")
                  :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91

            :ARG2 (m2 / magazine
                  :name (n3 / name
                        :op1 "Time")
                  :ARG1-of (f / feature-01))
            :time (y / year))
      :snt2 (k / know-01
            :ARG0 (a2 / anyone)
            :ARG1 (t / thing
                  :ARG1-of (d / do-02
                        :ARG0 (s / she)
                        :ARG2-of (e / except-01

                                          :ARG1 (s3 / school))
                                    :op2 (t2 / throw-01
                                          :ARG0 s
                                          :ARG1 (t3 / tantrum))))))
            :polarity (a4 / amr-unknown)))
